name: Breakout (itch) (Eduard400)
description:
Hi!

This is the first time I have created a game with C++ and SFML. I have decided to develop("copy") a old arcade game called Breakout which was released in 1976. There are 6 total levels.  Since this is my first time creating a game with C++ there could be some bugs and unexpected behaviour lol.

I have linked a youtube playlist which showcases the development of the game, make sure to check it out if you havent already!

Have fun!
